queries.query:
from(bucket: "sui")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "inserted_object" or r["_measurement"] == "missing_object" or r["_measurement"] == "modified_object")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

charts.name: Median Extraction Latency - From First RPC Request to MongoDB

queries.query:
from(bucket: "sui")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "extraction_latency")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latency_ms")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "median")

from(bucket: "sui")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "current_checkpoint")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "checkpoint_id")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30d, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "sui")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "current_checkpoint")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "checkpoint_id")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "sui")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "current_checkpoint")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "checkpoint_id")
  |> unique()
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "Count")

charts.name: Total Deleted Objects Returned from RPC

queries.query:
from(bucket: "sui")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ingest_error")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "object_id")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["error_type"] == "sui_object_deleted")
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "count")
